title: Sarah Michelle Gellar Celebrates 13th Anniversary With Freddie Prinze Jr.
content:
Defying the Hollywood couple odds.
MORE: Freddie Prinze Jr. & Sarah Michelle Gellar Are The Cutest Couple Ever - See The Pic!
Sarah Michelle Gellar and Freddie Prinze Jr. celebrated 13 years of marriage Tuesday and the actress couldn’t help but gush over her hubby with a sweet Instagram post.
“13 years #happyanniversary. I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you,” Gellar captioned a throwback snapshot from their wedding day.
The loving pair fell in love after meeting on the set of “I Know What You Did Last Summer” in 1997. Five years later they wed in Mexico and have been together ever since.
PLUS: Sarah Michelle Gellar Kicks Off Instagram Account With Sweet Pics Of Freddie Prinze Jr.
She added on Instagram, “I love you not only for what you have made of yourself, but for what you are making of me.”
  13 years #happyanniversary "I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you. I love you not only for what you have made of yourself, but for what you are making of me"

Sep 1, 2015 at 1:18pm PDT
